## Transaction type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Transaction = {
    __typename?: "Transaction";
    id: Scalars["String"];

    type?: Maybe<TransactionType>;

    interactionId?: Maybe<Scalars["String"]>;

};
```
